text: Gideoni nakamlonjela, “Gwa Mkulu wa heni, wone Mkulu Nguluwi ka hamwe na hetwe, lekachoni mbuli azi zeng'ha zitufika hetwe? Gakohi madito ga heye ga kububuwaza gowatulonjele wasekulu wa hetwe kuno wolonga, ‘Ndaze, hawele Mkulu Nguluwi, yatugale kuno kulawa Misili?’ Ila sambi nakatuleka, naye nakatuwika kuli moko ga Wamidiani.”
